landing.hero.title: Wisdom Through
landing.hero.description: Harness the collective intelligence of multiple AI agents debating your questions. Get balanced, well-reasoned answers through structured deliberation and expert judgment.
landing.hero.secondaryHint: You can sign in with Google or email on the next step.
landing.snapshot.caption: Parliament at a glance
landing.snapshot.description: Agents and judges assemble in a virtual chamber, exchanging arguments until a champion answer emerges.
landing.feature.multi.title: Multi-Agent Debate
landing.feature.multi.description: Multiple AI agents with different viewpoints craft answers together.
landing.feature.judges.title: Expert Judging
landing.feature.judges.description: Impartial judges score arguments, keeping reasoning balanced.
landing.feature.synthesis.title: Synthesized Wisdom
landing.feature.synthesis.description: Receive a champion answer that integrates diverse perspectives.
